data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Kalimantan Tengah to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kalimantan Tengah, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 2,212,100 people living in Kalimantan Tengah through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Kalimantan Tengah to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Kalimantan Tengah, Indonesia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Sanggau-Sekadau people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Kalimantan Tengah, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: God, guide the 70,973 believers in Kalimantan Tengah to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Kalimantan Tengah, Indonesia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
